body_html:
Each computation of the SVD on the GPU requires one memcpy from Device to the Host: the status report if the algorithm was successful needs to be copied from the GPU to the CPU to be checked.
This can in principle be a bottleneck, but can't be avoided.

But for me, the logs indicate that the GPU version is indeed faster than the CPU if you compare the timings. See my comment in the pull request for more details.

body:
Each computation of the SVD on the GPU requires one memcpy from Device to the Host: the status report if the algorithm was successful needs to be copied from the GPU to the CPU to be checked.
This can in principle be a bottleneck, but can't be avoided.

But for me, the logs indicate that the GPU version is indeed faster than the CPU if you compare the timings. See my comment in the pull request for more details.
